verses.verse: Now<WG1161> as touching<WG4012> things offered unto idols<WG1494>, we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> we<WG2192> all<WG3956> have<WG2192> knowledge<WG1108>. Knowledge<WG1108> puffs up<WG5448>, but<WG1161> love<WG26> edifies<WG3618>.
And<WG1161> if<WG1487> any man<WG5100> think<WG1380> that he knows<WG1492> any thing<WG5100>, he knows<WG1097> nothing<WG3762> yet<WG3764> as<WG2531> he ought<WG1163> to know<WG1097>.
But<WG1161> if<WG1487> any man<WG5100> loves<WG25> God<WG2316>, the same<WG3778> is known<WG1097> by<WG5259> him<WG846>.

As concerning<WG4012> therefore<WG3767> the eating<WG1035> of those things that are offered in sacrifice unto idols<WG1494>, we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> an idol<WG1497> is nothing<WG3762> in<WG1722> the world<WG2889>, and<WG2532> that<WG3754> there is none<WG3762> other<WG2087> God<WG2316> but<WG1487><WG99999> one<WG1520>.

For<WG1063> though<WG1512> there are<WG1526> those that are called<WG3004> gods<WG2316>, whether<WG1535> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> or<WG1535> in<WG1909> earth<WG1093>, (as<WG5618> there are<WG1526> many<WG4183> gods<WG2316>, and<WG2532> many<WG4183> lords<WG2962>,)

But<WG235> to us<WG2254> there is but one<WG1520> God<WG2316>, the Father<WG3962>, of<WG1537> whom<WG3739> are all things<WG3956>, and<WG2532> we<WG2249> in<WG1519> him<WG846>; and<WG2532> one<WG1520> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, by<WG1223> whom<WG3739> are all things<WG3956>, and<WG2532> we<WG2249> by<WG1223> him<WG846>.

But<WG235> there is not<WG3756> in<WG1722> every man<WG3956> that knowledge<WG1108>: for<WG1161> some<WG5100> with conscience<WG4893> of the idol<WG1497> unto<WG2193> this hour<WG737> eat<WG2068> it as<WG5613> a thing offered unto an idol<WG1494>; and<WG2532> their<WG846> conscience<WG4893> being<WG5607> weak<WG772> is defiled<WG3435>.

But<WG1161> food<WG1033> commends<WG3936> us<WG2248> not<WG3756> to God<WG2316>: for<WG1063> neither<WG3777>, if<WG1437> we eat<WG5315>, are we the better<WG4052>; neither<WG3777>, if<WG1437> we eat<WG5315> not<WG3361>, are we the worse<WG5302>.
But<WG1161> take care<WG991> lest by any means<WG3381> this<WG3778> liberty<WG1849> of yours<WG5216> becomes<WG1096> a stumblingblock<WG4348> to them<WG3588> that are weak<WG770>.

For<WG1063> if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> sees<WG1492> you<WG4571> which have<WG2192> knowledge<WG1108> sit at food<WG2621> in<WG1722> the idol<WG1493>'s temple, shall<WG3618> not<WG3780> the conscience<WG4893> of him<WG846> which is<WG5607> weak<WG772> be emboldened<WG3618> to eat<WG2068><WG99999> those things which are offered to idols<WG1494>;
And<WG2532> through<WG1909> your<WG4674> knowledge<WG1108> shall<WG622> the weak<WG770> brother<WG80> perish<WG622>, for<WG1223> whom<WG3739> Christ<WG5547> died<WG599>?
But<WG1161> when you sin<WG264> so<WG3779> against<WG1519> the brothers<WG80>, and<WG2532> wound<WG5180> their<WG846> weak<WG770> conscience<WG4893>, you sin<WG264> against<WG1519> Christ<WG5547>.

Therefore<WG1355>, if<WG1487> food<WG1033> causes<WG4624> my<WG3450> brother<WG80> to stumble<WG4624>, I will eat<WG5315><WG99999> no<WG3361> flesh<WG2907> while<WG1519> the world stands<WG165>, lest<WG3361> I cause<WG4624> my<WG3450> brother<WG80> to<WG2443> stumble<WG4624>.
